monsters.name: werebeaver
monsters.description: Some poor humanoid has become infected with werebeaveritis. They have turned into a rabid beaver. It thinks you kicked its dam and it's not happy about it.
monsters.fightDamage: The werebeaver skillfully dodges your attack, using its tail as a springboard to get close enough to sink its vile teeth into your leg. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The werebeaver goes limp and falls to the ground.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: The lumpy body of the werebeaver lies huddled on the floor, powerful tail now limp and unmoving.

monsters.name: monstrousKoiFish
monsters.description: An evil mage has gigantified a once-pretty-looking koi fish and granted it the ability to breathe air. It now sports fangs and a denim jacket with the sleeves ripped off. It has sick tribal tats around its fins.
monsters.fightDamage: The monstrous koi fish wobbles around your attack. It then slides toward you, sinking its fang into you. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The koi fish suddenly stiffens its muscles. It begins to shrink, slowly at first, then rapidly. It is now the size of a typical koi, flopping around inside the denim jacket it once wore.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: The disintegrating body of a small, colorful koi fish lies in a small puddle on the ground.

monsters.name: pheonixBear
monsters.description: It appears to be part bear, part phoenix with a large blue mane and azure fur.
monsters.fightDamage: The Pheonix Bear RAGES, dropping its head and charging at you with its fearsome claws. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The Phoenix Bear gives a whimpering cry, self-engulfing into a pile of ash... better get out of here fast.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: There is a pile of ash where the Pheonix Bear used to be.

monsters.name: mummy
monsters.description: Wrapped in ancient cloths, this creature moans in a low rummbling tone
monsters.fightDamage: The mummy is faster than it looks, and before you know it, the creature has grabbed you. You feel lifeforce drain out of your body. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The mummy, in one final gasp, crumbles into a pile of cloth.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: There is a pile of crumbling cloth bandages where the mummy used to be.

monsters.name: frumiousBandersnatch
monsters.description: Loping and lolloping along toward you, jaws agape and tongue lolling out between fangs of preposterous proportion, the Bandersnatch of sagas is at all times famishing and eager for the hunt.
monsters.fightDamage: The Bandersnatch lunges toward you and sinks its fangs to the bone in your leg. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The Bandersnatch staggers, roaring, before collapsing in an untidy heap of long limbs and grinning fangs.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: The Bandersnatch sprawls on the ground, thoroughly dead.

monsters.name: greenOoze
monsters.description: The bright, rippling green of a bowl of jello, but grown to shocking size, endowed with two red eyes, and squelching toward you.
monsters.fightDamage: The Ooze extends a psuedopod which glops onto your leg.  Acid burns you.  You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The Ooze explodes into a shower of jello, leaving sticky puddles all over the floor.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: The walls are splotched with smears of sticky green.  A good mopping would definitely help.

monsters.name: mimic
monsters.description: An innocuous treasure chest that seems completely non-threatening
monsters.fightDamage: The treasure chest jumps out at you, biting into your arm.  You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The treasure chest falls over with a pathetic gurgle.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: The empty mimic is spread-eagled on the ground, quite dead.

monsters.name: flameElemental
monsters.description: You see what appears to be a sentient flame enjoying its day in this fine dungeon
monsters.fightDamage: The flames jump at you and burn brightly scorching you. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: Proper fire safety training has ut the flames out.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: A scorched spot is on the ground.

monsters.name: faerie
monsters.description: A glowing purple ball appears to be in the room, it appears slightly malevolent
monsters.fightDamage: The faerie strikes back at you before crumbling into dust. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The light fades as the fae falls to the ground crumbling to dust.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: You see a pile of dust while inactive it still radiates malevolence.

monsters.name: treasure_find
monsters.description: You don't see any monsters, but there is a small pile of rubble that might be hiding something.
monsters.corpse: You don't see any monsters, but the floor is littered with rubble.

monsters.name: treasure_find
monsters.description: You don't see any monsters, but there is a small chest, the wood so soft and rotten you can push through it easily.
monsters.corpse: You don't see any monsters, but there is a small chest, the wood of its top has been broken through to expose its empty contents

monsters.name: treasure_find
monsters.description: You don't see any monsters, but one section of the wall looks suspiciously discolored and cracked.
monsters.corpse: You don't see any monsters, but one section of the wall has been broken away leaving an empty nook.

monsters.name: treasure_find
monsters.description: You don't see any monsters, but there is an ancient wooden chest with a rust-eaten lock.
monsters.corpse: You don't see any monsters, but there is an open and empty ancient wooden chest.

monsters.name: treasure_find
monsters.description: You don't see any monsters, but there is a skeleton dressed in rags, still cradling something in its bony grip.
monsters.corpse: You don't see any monsters, but there is a skeleton dressed in rags.

monsters.name: treant
monsters.description: If trees could walk around and look pissed that would be an acurate description of what you see
monsters.fightDamage: The treant strickes at you before falling to pieces. You lose one point of health.  You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.fightDie: The flames burn the treant to cinders. You found treasure! Check your inventory.
monsters.corpse: You see the remains of a once great tree

monsters.name: honeyBadger
monsters.fightDamage: You were bitten by the Honey Badger, you might want to check for rabies when you get out. You lose one point of health.
monsters.corpse: Honey Badger is just sitting there.

monsters.name: waitInLine
monsters.description: You find yourself in at the back of queue with people waiting in line ahead of you.
monsters.fightDamage: You attacked the people in the queue they did not appreciate that. You lose one point of health.
monsters.fightDie: Thankyou for your patience. You recieved Treasure, Check your inventory
monsters.corpse: You see the queue you rememeber fondly waiting in
